transcript:
Hello?
Hello
Hello. Hello?
Yes sir, aapka kal call aaya tha lead ke liye.
Haa, Agni ji bol rahe hain kya?
Haa, aapne kal mujhe call kiya tha na, lead ka view bhi ki.
Hanji mam, abhi main father ko leke hospital aaya hu mam, kal bola tha na.
Haa haa.
Hello.
Isliye mam, lekin karte karte raat ho jayega.
To jo mere buyleads vagera dekhe hain, kal main dekha tha kuch, to kal se main usko jo jo do din hai hamare paas.
Iske andar hi hum usko consume karenge.
Achha achha, aap mobile se kar lete hain agar mobile hai vagera to.
Mobile se, dada aapko lead bhi batai thi fir vo chali jayegi na sir, matlab sold out ho jayegi.
Haa lekin abhi hospital hai mam, baat to nahi kar sakte client ke sath, jis tarah ki baat hoti hai client ke sath.
Nahi nahi nahi, baat karne ki jarurat nahi hai.
Baat bhale hi aap abhi mat karo.
Achha achha. Bas aap contact by now par click karke usko apne paas to kar lo, uski number aur detail to vo aa jayegi lead manager mein.
Haa mam.
Baat nahi kar rahe, aisa jaruri thodi hai ki aapne abhi lead consume kar li to aap vaise matlab normally agar aap office mein hai, kaam kar rahe hain, to hum aisa hi karte hain, lekin agar jaise koi emergency aapki fas rahi hai.
Hum hum.
Usme aapki dono cheeze manage ho jaye, matlab aapke father ki bhi tabiyat manage ho jaye aur ya ye bhi handle karna ho.
Isliye aap bas contact by now kar lijiye, vaha pe lead manager mein uska naam aur number aa jayega.
Aapke father admit hai kya?
Haa admit hai abhi.
To admit hai, unko kya ho gaya unko?
Han unka jo hota hai na sugar aur bahut cheez mane itna badh gaya ki vo bistar pe hi aapka bed vagera ho jata tha.
Achha achha. To abhi usko abhi hospital mein admit hoke unka dawai karke fir unko fir ghar mein jana hai aaj, uska wheelchair pe unko leke aaya hu main.
Are, matlab kidney vagera sab theek hai?
Nahi nahi vo to theek hai, vo aapka ek to problem aa gayi unka jo sugar hai itna badh gaya ki vo unko dikhne mein problem ho raha hai, unko samajh mein nahi aa raha, thoda idhar udhar ka baatein kar rahe hain.
Wahi problem ho raha hai.
Achha achha.
Sochne samajhne mein, ho jata hai na matlab jaise dialysis vagera to nahi hota unka?
Nahi us stage nahi pahucha hai, bhagwan ki kripa.
To vo theek ho jayenge kyuki humne pehle usko detect ho gaya na.
Haa haa haa.
Agar unko sugar badh raha hai, to aap aisa kar sakte ho kyuki matlab aaloo, chawal vagera ye sab band kar do.
Haa ye to mam theek bole vo to band hai.
Kyuki meri mother ki bhi 10 baar badhi thi, matlab itni level ki to nahi jitna aap bata rahe ho, to unhone bilkul matlab zero kar diya tha aaloo aur chawal ko.
Ji. Theek hai aur vaise vo mithai mitha itna nahi nahi khate the.
Theek hai. Ye to bilkul band hai.
Haa, aisa nahi hai ki sirf humko meethe mithai se hi hota hai, hamare paas hamare khane mein bahut si cheeze hoti hai, jinme sugar hota hai, jaise gehu hai.
Gehu mein roti mein bahut sugar hota hai.
Mam, doctor aake thoda baad mein baat karte hain na.
Doctor aa gaye mam, thoda baad mein.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is in hospital with his father.

- Wants to consume buyleads later.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested to click on contact by now.

- Suggested to avoid sugar and rice.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, health, sugar, hospital
